project.description: Executes the DataHunter Demo Selenium Test Plan over a short period for verification

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RunCI
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Untick will perform this Script verification Job ONLY and will not trigger the full performance test.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Application
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Application name as it will appear in the Mark59 Trends application

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Duration
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Test run Duration in seconds - Should be only a long as necessary to validate the test plan

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Users
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Number of users to use for shakeout. Will be applied across all (non-metric) thread groups that have been parameterized.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MonitoringUsers
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Number of users to use for shakeout of the 'metric capture' thread groups that have been parameterized (Usually either 1 or 0).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OverrideTestResultsFile
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Write the Jmeter Test Plan results out to somewhere where they will not be picked up and treated as the final Results to be processed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ExtraParam1
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
ExtraParma1 - ExtraParam9 Available
Additional optional arguments that can be passed to Jmeter. For example, if your test plan has a parameter 'ForceTxnFailPercent' (sample usage : ${__P(ForceTxnFailPercent,25)} ), then a value can be passed from here such as:
-JForceTxnFailPercent=50

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ExtraParam2
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: You can add all the 'ExtraParam' arguments in here if you wish , and leave there Default Values blank if they are not required

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SetPath
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: %JAVA_HOME%;C:\Windows\System32;C:\windows\system32\wbem ?? Set Path required to invoke commands. wbem is required to run the WMIC commands used to capture Win metric data, and is not by default on the path.
